text: The 1962 Oregon Webfoots football team represented the University of Oregon as an independent during the 1962 NCAA University Division football season. In their 12th season under head coach Len Casanova, the Webfoots compiled a 6–3–1 record and outscored their opponents, 229 to 156. The team played its home games at Hayward Field in Eugene, Oregon. The team's statistical leaders included Bob Berry with 995 passing yards and Mel Renfro with 753 rushing yards and 298 receiving yards. ==Schedule== ==Roster== *HB Mel Renfro, Jr. ==References== Oregon Category:Oregon Ducks football seasons Oregon Ducks football
title: 1962 Oregon Webfoots football team
